abstract: Royal Dutch Shell, Europe’s largest oil company, is planning to sell oil fields in Nigeria valued at up to $5 billion, The Sunday Times reported.
snippet: Royal Dutch Shell, Europe’s largest oil company, is planning to sell oil fields in Nigeria valued at up to $5 billion, The Sunday Times reported.
lead_paragraph: Royal Dutch Shell, Europe’s largest oil company, is planning to sell oil fields in Nigeria valued at up to $5 billion, The Sunday Times reported, citing sources linked to companies interested in the assets.

headline.main: Shell Said to Plan $5 Billion Sale of Nigerian Assets
